Articles.Content:
I got some requests to make another video, so I turned it into a series. Episode 2 is now out!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H2zFzn7N3ZU
Wow, glad you read my messages XD. LOVE this series! Keep it up!
Alright, I'll try to keep up the series and post it every couple of days. Glad you like it!
UPDATE: Thanks to everyone for all the support, I would like to thank you all for getting me to 30 subscribers! I hope to gain more fans and make bigger and better videos in the future! =D
You are looking at subscriber #34, keep it up!

Thanks Blaylock! I love knowing that people like the stupid stuff I do in KSP. I have set up a schedule but I probably won't even listen to it and post when I please, but the streams I will probably follow. in fact, I might do one later tonight.
